short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Export Salesforce listview data as excel sheet

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension works only for Salesforce classic. With ‘Astrea Listview Export for Salesforce’ it becomes very easy for user to export listview data into excel. Using this extension user can download their respective data of listview.
Please contact us at support@astreait.com for any queries. For additional information visit our website http://astreait.com/AstreaExcelConverter/
